title: 820-00165 audio
message: Got a 820-00165 that the audio goes in and out.  its not constant.  some time copmuter will boot up and have no sound sometimes it will.  I've changed i/o board twice and hasn't fixed issue.  board looks clean, no liquid damage or drops.

title: 820-00165 audio
message:
Did you change LIO flex too?
Inspect LIO connector from MLB under microscope.
OSX recognizes audio device in system report always?
